Inclination.label: Inclination
Inclination.tooltip: Angle Measured from Equator on the Ascending Node

Eccentricity.label: Eccentricity
Eccentricity.tooltip: How Circular the Orbit Is (0 is a Circle)

RightAsc.label: Right Asc.
RightAsc.tooltip: Where it Rises Above the Equator

ArgOfPerigee.label: Arg of Perigee
ArgOfPerigee.tooltip: Where the Lowest Part of the Orbit Is

Period.label: Period
Period.tooltip: Time for One Complete Revolution Around Earth

Velocity.label: Velocity
Velocity.tooltip: Current Velocity of the Satellite (Higher the Closer to Earth it Is)

AgeOfGP.label: Age of GP
AgeOfGP.tooltip: Time Since Official Orbit Calculated (Older GP Data is Less Accurate Usually)
